practiceAreas: Bankruptcy|Business Law|Criminal Defense|Elder Law|Employment Law|Estate Planning|Family Law|Personal Injury|Probate & Estate Administration
description:
WH Law Offices has five total locations in central Arkansas, including our office in Fayetteville from which we deliver the highest level of representation and support to a diverse range of clients across our region who have legal needs involving any of the following:

• Estate planning, probate and estate administration
• Elder law
• Business law
• Employment law
• Bankruptcy
• Personal injury
• Family law
• Criminal defense

When you work with our law firm, you will receive the benefit of working directly with a local, top-ranked attorney who has your best interests at heart. Over the course of our practice, we have achieved a long record of securing the positive results our clients seek efficiently and cost-effectively. Additionally, our attorneys have earned consistent designation as among the leading lawyers for their practice areas along with "Superb" client ratings on Avvo.

Dedicated to providing unmatched legal representation at prices that won't break your bank, we offer fixed, affordable rates for most of our services. We also maintain a transparent fee schedule and flexible payment options to help you get the legal help you need when you need it the most.

To speak with one of our attorneys with no risk or obligation, you can contact WH Law Offices by calling our office or visiting our website to set up a free initial consultation, and we offer virtual consultations in an effort to help keep you safe in today's uncertain environment.

We are a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
